mapper.select: SELECT MOVIECD, MOVIENM, GENRE, TO_CHAR(OPENDT,'YYYY/MM/DD')OPENDT, CONTENTS, SHOWTM, WATCHGRADENM,CONTENTS FROM MOVIE
SELECT MOVIECD, MOVIENM, GENRE, TO_CHAR(OPENDT,'YYYY/MM/DD')OPENDT, CONTENTS, SHOWTM, CONTENTS FROM MOVIE WHERE PRDTSTATNM='개봉'
SELECT MOVIECD, MOVIENM, GENRE, TO_CHAR(OPENDT,'YYYY/MM/DD')OPENDT, CONTENTS, SHOWTM, CONTENTS FROM MOVIE WHERE PRDTSTATNM='개봉예정'
SELECT MOVIECD, MOVIENM, GENRE, TO_CHAR(OPENDT,'YYYY/MM/DD')OPENDT, CONTENTS, SHOWTM, CONTENTS FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIENM LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT MOVIECD,MOVIENM,GENRE,SHOWTM,OPENDT FROM( SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY OPENDT DESC)RANK,MOVIECD,MOVIENM,GENRE,SHOWTM,OPENDT FROM MOVIE WHERE OPENDT < SYSDATE)
WHERE RANK <=4
SELECT MOVIECD,MOVIENM,GENRE,SHOWTM,OPENDT FROM( SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY OPENDT DESC)RANK,MOVIECD,MOVIENM,GENRE,SHOWTM,OPENDT FROM MOVIE WHERE OPENDT > SYSDATE-20) WHERE RANK <=4
SELECT MOVIECD,MOVIENM,GENRE,SHOWTM,OPENDT FROM( SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY SHOWTM DESC)RANK,MOVIECD,MOVIENM,GENRE,SHOWTM,OPENDT FROM MOVIE WHERE SHOWTM < 150) WHERE RANK <=4
